solution_line_template: In total, the {num_croutons} croutons have {crouton_calories_per_crouton} calories/crouton * {num_croutons} croutons = <<{crouton_calories_per_crouton}*{num_croutons}={total_crouton_calories}>>{total_crouton_calories} calories.

Together, the croutons, lettuce and cucumber have {total_crouton_calories} + {lettuce_calories} + {cucumber_calories} = <<{total_crouton_calories}+{lettuce_calories}+{cucumber_calories}={total_salad_calories}>>{total_salad_calories} calories
